message.body: hey, ken... any runs today? do you need me to take the suit to joanne's?
No, we're still not at that point. I will let you know.

cool. just wanted to check in with you.
also...is it okay to cash that last check, or should i keep holding on to it?
You can cash it. Last week's payroll will have to wait until next Friday though. Sorry.
cool. no problem. i really appreciate the work, ken...you've really helped me out. waiting is no issue - it's the least i can do.
